name: Florida Interstate '86
description:
Welcome to FLORIDA INTERSTATE '86, a light-weight driving game where the goal is to cruise into the sunset for as long as possible while earning points by collecting cassette tapes and driving dangerously. A dynamic noon-sunset lighting system, a selection of colorful retro-styled sports cars and a synthwave/chillwave soundtrack ensure that every single one of your trips into this '80s fantasy Sunshine State is a unique one.

If you enjoy this game, consider having a look at the 'Florida Freeway Pass' which unlocks all the features of Florida Interstate '86, gives you access to future content and also serves as a token of appreciation towards its developers.

Design / Art / Code: Balázs Kalocsai
Quality Assurance: Csaba Opra-Szabó

Soundtrack by Prof. Zonic Zynth and Peter Guja

Soundtrack playlist available on Apple Music
